description.narrative: to improve the adequacy, equity and effectiveness of financing and the oversight, management and delivery of local government services in education, health, water and environment, and micro irrigation, including refugees and their host communities.

title.narrative: Number of core central functions carried in support of service delivery (in Education, Health and Crosscutting Areas)
IR Indicator 2.5: Cumulative % of agreed actions to strengthen social and environmental management implemented
LG Non Wage Recurrent Financing - % of Grant Allocations for Health and Education based on an Equitable Formula
IR Indicator 4.1 – Education: Number of new secondary schools constructed, equipped and staffed to minimum levels
IR Indicator 4.2 – Education: Number of primary schools upgraded to meet basic infrastructure standards (cumulative)
IR Indicator 4.3 – Education: Number of LGs where the school performance assessment and improvement framework has been implemented
IR Indicator 2.4: Cumulative number of actions to improve service delivery implemented from the service delivery improvement matrix
IR Indicator 4.5 – Health: Number of HCIIs upgraded to HCIII which are completed, equipped and staffed up to at least minimum staffing levels.
LG Development Financing - % of Grant Allocations for Health, Education on an Equitable Formula
IR Indicator 1.6 Enhanced, equitable formula for conditional development grants in health and education implemented as per plan.
IR Indicator 1.5 - Average % of budgeted non-wage recurrent transfers (as per allocation formula) in the health and education released to Local Governments.
LG Non Wage Recurrent Financing - Nominal Budget Allocations for Health and Education (UGX billion)
LG Development Financing - Nominal Budget Allocations for Health and Education (UGX billion)
IR Indicator 1.3: Average conditional non-wage recurrent grants for health and education per beneficiary for the 20 least funded LGs as % national per capita value.
IR Indicator 1.1: Average size conditional non-wage recurrent grants for education (primary & secondary only) and health servicesper capita.
IR Indicator 1.4: Average conditional development grants for health and education per beneficiary for the 20 least funded LGs as %national per capita value. (formula-based only)
IR Indicator 1.2: Average size of conditional development grants per capita for health and education
IR Indicator 4.6 - Health: Number of existing HCIIIs or HCIVs rehabilitated, expanded and/or equipped to meet basic standards.
Critical Sector Departments & LLG staff - % of LGs all critical staff in place.
Health Facilities - % of LGs with enough health workers to meet minimum staffing levels.
Secondary Schools - % of LGs with enough teachers to meet minimum staffing levels.
Primary Schools - % of LGs with enough teachers to meet minimum staffing levels.
Education: % of LLGs with population >15,000 with a government secondary school with basic facilities and minimum staffing levels
Health: % of sub-counties with population >15,000 with a functional health center III or IV
Education: Average score in the primary school performance assessment improves in the sample LGs.
Health: Average score in the RBF facility assessment improves
IR Indicator 3.1: Improvement in LG performance in the management of human resources as measured in the annual performance assessment
IR Indicator 3.2: Improvement in LG performance in the inspection, monitoring and assessment of service delivery as measured in theannual performance assessment
IR Indicator 3.3: Improvement in LG performance in the oversight of construction and the implementation of environmental and socialrequirements
IR Indicator 3.4: Increase in the average number of minimum conditions met by LGs.
Improvement in LG Management Performance Overall (in Education, Health and Cross-cutting Areas)
Improvement in LG management performance in the worst performing LGs (in Education, Health and Cross-cutting Areas)
IR Indicator 2.1: Central Government Essential Guidance Issued and Disseminated
IR Indicator 2.2: Central Government Performance Assessments and Performance Improvement Support Implemented
IR Indicator 2.3 Routine Coordination, Oversight, Monitoring and Technical Support of service delivery and safeguards requirements by central government Implemented
